name: Single filer at high income
description: Standard case for single person earning €100,000 in the Netherlands

sources.description: Calculated using official 2025 Dutch tax rates and credits from Belastingdienst
sources.notes: Income tax: 35.82% up to €38,441, 37.48% from €38,441-€76,817, 49.50% above €76,817. General credit: €0 (fully phased out). Labour credit: €5,599 - 6.510% of (income - €43,071)
